message.body: Sorry to bother you with this - I just need to figure something out bc I'm not getting paid again this month
I'll put some money in your account. Would $400 be enough? And why aren't you getting paid? You're working!

Well training pays minimum wage only and then they didn't get me on the schedule for a week and now the money I'm making won't be on a check until next pay day. I'm also looking at apartments and found the PERFECT place with the most PERFECT roommates. But i will need to pay first, last, and a deposit to move in on September first... That would be 1,725 on September first. I'll have to email you my plans but I may need more car money for that...
Yea, that'll be good for this rent
